alert.note: Alert for Blue Earth; Watonwan (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 4:19PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Brown, northwestern Blue Earth, northeastern Watonwan and central Nicollet Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 419 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a gust front ahead of thundestorms along a line extending from 5 miles northeast of New Ulm to near Courtland to near Hanska. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Courtland around 425 PM CDT. Madelia and Nicollet around 435 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Lake Crystal and North Mankato. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 14 between mile markers 102 and 135. U.S. Highway 169 between mile markers 37 and 60. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
